note: Sociologist at UC San Diego. Author of Automating Finance (2019) & The Quantified Scholar (2022) http://tinyurl.com/2p82v69n Associate Director at LAS UCSD

fields.name: What do I do?
fields.value: I'm a sociologist working at UCSD. I study markets and teach methods, science and technology studies, and economic sociology.

fields.name: What am I working on?
fields.value: I'm working on two books. One is on the politics of scientific elites in Mexico. The other is on the role of budget models in racializing American higher education.

fields.name: What do I think matters?
fields.value: The world is burning. Let's try to make that stop, please.

note:
I'm a Professor with special responsibilities in audience research at Roskilde University, Denmark and Co-Founder/Director of its Centre for Digital Citizenship. Academically, I'm a media sociologist who studies informational flows and and people's sensemaking practices.

Personally, I'm a Canadian who came to Denmark via the Netherlands, picking up a partner and two kids along the way to try something different. When I grow up I want to be a flâneur & am refining my stroll. 🇨🇦🇳🇱🇩🇰

Sociologist:
Interest in Research Methodology, Social & Policy Research, Data Science, Epistemology, Privacy, IT.
